attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To insist GP s, who are the fundholders , not their employers,are referring the over 50's for hospital appointments  to the  right tier hospital and that unbiased research is done in TIER ONE HOSPITALS  and that full time specialists  are in charge of their Depts funding and can liase and coordinate with other Depts and TIER 3  Hospitals, not the GPs[ PCT/LAs]     .
